=== Progress from last 3 weeks ===

* Dmedia 907335: <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/dmedia/+bug/907335|sudo make me a browser]]</nowiki> - see video of <nowiki>[[http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vkEB6mjDcXE|GStreamer video playback in Dmedia browser]]</nowiki>
* Microfiber 907189: <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/microfiber/+bug/907189|Drop hard-coded version string test, plus add dmedia_env()]]</nowiki>
* !UserWebKit 907632: <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/userwebkit/+bug/907632|Add ability to open external links in defaut browser]]</nowiki>
* Built all 11.12 components in <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~novacut/+archive/pre-stable|ppa:novacut/pre-stable]]</nowiki>, started work on 12.01
* !UserWebKit 908979: <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/userwebkit/+bug/908979|Resolve dmedia: URIs into file:// URIs]]</nowiki>
* Dmedia 908990: <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/dmedia/+bug/908990|Use dmedia: URI for video.src in browser]]</nowiki>
* Dmedia 898368: <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/dmedia/+bug/898368|Extract EXIF metadata from Canon 60D videos]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[http://vimeo.com/groups/novacutartistdiaries/videos/34324748|Screencast of Jason making the 11.12 release]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[http://blog.novacut.com/2011/12/announcing-novacut-1112-components.html|Released 11.12!]]</nowiki>
* Delivered <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/couchdb/+bug/903098|CouchDB 1.1.1]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[https://code.launchpad.net/~jderose/desktopcouch/uri_file-fix/+merge/85431|desktopcouch with CouchDB 1.1.1 compatability fix]]</nowiki> to <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~novacut/+archive/stable|ppa:novacut/stable]]</nowiki> for both Precise ''and'' Oneiric users
* !UserWebKit 910365: <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/userwebkit/+bug/910365|Refactor to better fit Novacut and Dmedia patterns]]</nowiki>
* Dmedia 910366: <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/dmedia/+bug/910366|Port to UserWebKit API charges]]</nowiki>
* Novacut 910727: <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/novacut/+bug/910727|Add support for dmedia:FOO URIs]]</nowiki>
* Barry Warsaw has a new <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/dbus-python/+bug/893091|python3-dbus]]</nowiki> package available for testing in <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~barry/+archive/python?field.series_filter=precise|ppa:barry/python]]</nowiki>
